name: Deer_Meadow_Sheriff%27s_Department
text:
Deer Meadow Sheriff's Department
The Deer Meadow Sheriff's Department are the law enforcement in Deer Meadow, Washington.
As of 1988, the sheriff was Cable. FBI Agent, Sam Stanley, estimated the building's worth to be around $27,000 (with furniture included). 
History
To be added.
Personnel
Sheriff Cable
Deputy Cliff Howard
Unnamed receptionist
